subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, June 16 (AP) — Cubs first baseman Derrek Lee swung at San Diego pitcher Chris Young after Lee was hit by a pitch in the fourth inning Saturday, setting off a benches-clearing skirmish between the teams.
snippet: CHICAGO, June 16 (AP) — Cubs first baseman Derrek Lee swung at San Diego pitcher Chris Young after Lee was hit by a pitch in the fourth inning Saturday, setting off a benches-clearing skirmish between the teams.
